mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mem_account ( mem_idx, mem_seq_no, access_token, refresh_token, bank_code_std, account_num, fintech_use_num, balance_amt ) VALUES ( #{mem_idx}, #{mem_seq_no}, #{access_token}, #{refresh_token}, #{bank_code_std}, #{account_num}, #{fintech_use_num}, #{balance_amt} ) ;
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.access_token, t.user_seq_no FROM mem_account AS t LEFT JOIN member AS m ON t.id = m.id WHERE m.id = #{id} AND m.bank_auth_status = 'Y'
